TopicTitle: OP Bug Test #407 contract, 150k science gain?

Articles.Content: im playing with some mods, but i dont know which contract/ contract pack adds in the bug test #407 contract, it gives 150K science for going 5m/s over land, and i dont know what adds it. anybody know?

Haha its mine. GAP. Go to your GameData\ContractPacks\GAP folder and delete the Development folder. You must have downloaded a dev version of GAP.

16 hours ago, 123nick said:

im playing with some mods, but i dont know which contract/ contract pack adds in the bug test #407 contract, it gives 150K science for going 5m/s over land, and i dont know what adds it. anybody know?

 

Its a bug test contract for Contract Configurator I made. Gives lots of science so I can rapidly unlock the tech tree. Don't play it. Delete the Development folder in GAP.
